featured_story.title: UNC Receives $2.5 Million Grant for Climate Research
featured_story.image_alt: UNC researchers in the field collecting climate data
featured_story.excerpt: The National Science Foundation has awarded UNC a $2.5 million grant to study climate change impacts in the Rocky Mountain region. The five-year project will involve faculty and students from multiple departments.

secondary_stories.title: New Student Success Center Opens
secondary_stories.image_alt: Students studying in the new success center
secondary_stories.excerpt: UNC's new Student Success Center opened its doors this month, offering expanded tutoring services, study spaces, and academic support resources.

secondary_stories.title: Bears Athletics Celebrates Record-Breaking Season
secondary_stories.excerpt: Multiple UNC athletic programs achieved conference championships and national rankings in what has become one of the most successful seasons in school history.

secondary_stories.title: Faculty Research Spotlight: Dr. Sarah Martinez
secondary_stories.image_alt: Dr. Martinez in her research lab
secondary_stories.excerpt: Psychology professor Dr. Sarah Martinez has been recognized for her groundbreaking research in cognitive development and early childhood education.
